data.oai_dc:dc: R code for conducting statistical tests presented in article

This code calculates correlation coefficients related to figures 3, 4, 5, S3, and S5, as well as the analyses for figure S2, figure S4 and, Table S2. It requires as input the species-level liana interaction statistics file "treespstatsrelianas.csv" and the bootstrapped iterations of the key statistics "bootstraplianastats.rds" that are the output of running "bci_speciescalcs.r". See comments in the code for additional information.
